mapper.select: SELECT A.p_title title, A.p_name name, A.p_price price, A.p_quantity quantity, A.description, D.allergy_name allergy, C.cate_id step from product A INNER JOIN product_category_relation B ON A.product_id = B.product_id INNER JOIN category C ON C.cate_id = B.cate_id INNER JOIN allergy D ON A.allergy = D.allergy_id WHERE A.product_id = #{productId};
